overview: Vasiliki, a first-year student with social anxiety disorder, moves to her place of study. The sudden change in her environment isolates her from her surroundings and brings her face to face with her problem. With the help of social media, she will try to overcome the obstacles created by her anxiety and to join the social context of her new life. The events are narrated mainly through her cell phone, which mirrors her mental world and reveals what she herself cannot say. The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: PRISMA
